kolkata.name: Kolkata
kolkata.description: The City of Joy – famous for culture, food, and heritage.

attractions.name: Victoria Memorial
attractions.desc: A majestic marble museum dedicated to Queen Victoria.

attractions.name: Howrah Bridge
attractions.desc: An iconic steel bridge spanning the Hooghly River.

attractions.name: Park Street
attractions.desc: The best place for nightlife and authentic Bengali cuisine.

goa.name: Goa
goa.description: India’s beach paradise – sun, sand, and sea adventures.

attractions.name: Baga Beach
attractions.desc: Famous for its nightlife, water sports, and shacks.

attractions.name: Aguada Fort
attractions.desc: Historic fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.

attractions.name: Anjuna Market
attractions.desc: Vibrant flea market for souvenirs and beachwear.
